about.description: Software engineer specializing in mobile and web application development, I design and implement tailored solutions to meet the specific needs of my clients. Passionate about innovation and backed by strong technical expertise, I am committed to delivering high-quality projects that align with your deadlines, expectations, and vision. Detail-oriented and results-driven, I see every project as an opportunity to create lasting impact and foster meaningful collaborations. Focused on cutting-edge technologies, I aim to bring your ideas to life with unique and high-performing digital solutions.

esprit.name: ESPRIT: Private Higher School of Engineering and Technologies
esprit.degree: National Engineering Degree in Computer Science

fesmt.name: Faculty of Economic Sciences and Management of Tunis
fesmt.degree: Bachelor of Science in Management Information Systems

projects.name: Madidou Real Estate Rental Mobile Application
projects.description: Developed a secure and innovative platform for real estate rentals using Flutter, Node.js, and Firebase. Focused on designing user interfaces, backend development, and cloud deployment to ensure scalability and reliability.

projects.name: Taxis Freressok Drivers Management System
projects.description: Taxis Freressok is a driver management platform using Next.js, Node.js, Firebase, and Twilio. It streamlines operations with real-time notifications, course management, and secure authentication, ensuring efficiency and scalability.

projects.name: DevOps Mobile Platform
projects.description: Created a mobile platform for continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD) of applications using React.js, Node.js, and GitHub Actions. Focused on automated processes, testing, and documentation for maintenance and future updates.

projects.name: My Portfolio Website
projects.description: Built a responsive and interactive portfolio website using Next.js, JavaScript, and TypeScript, showcasing skills, projects, and achievements with optimized performance and modern design.

projects.name: Java EE Leave Management Application
projects.description: Built an application for managing leave requests, approvals, and tracking using Java EE and JavaServer Faces (JSF). Worked on user interface design, backend logic, and user training for system adoption.
